requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
